          <title>
            <string language="en">Photon absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Photonabsorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption de photon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption do photon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento del fotone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απορρόφηση φωτονίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Absorción del fotón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration explains why a photon must have the right amount of energy to be absorbed by an electron.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photon absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung erklärt, warum ein Photon die 
rechte Menge der durch ein Elektron aufgesogen zu werden Energie haben
muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration explique pourquoi un photon 
doit avoir la bonne quantité d'énergie à absorber par un électron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração explica porque um photon deve 
ter a quantidade direita de energia a ser absorvida por um elétron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione spiega perchè un fotone 
deve avere la giusta quantità di energia da assorbire da un 
elettrone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εξηγεί γιατί ένα φωτόνιο πρέπει 
να έχει το σωστό ποσό ενέργειας που απορροφάται από ένα 
ηλεκτρόνιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración explica porqué un fotón debe 
tener la cantidad derecha de energía que se absorberá por un 
electrón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiestufen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Photonabsorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">assorbimento del fotone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
